string.value: Receive your first mission as a Secret Organization Temporary Member. The mission should be contained behind the #b#p2012034##k inside the #b#m200080601##k...

The paper behind the #p2012034# says to bring back a Growth Accelerant made by a person named #b#p2030012##k. This must be your first mission.

#i4032468# #t4032468# #b#c4032468# / 10#k
You placed the Growth Accelerant made for you by #p2030012# behind the brick. The Secret Organization must be group of really good people to make a potion that will help the crops in Maple World.
#b(You take the brick out and place your hand inside the empty gap. You find a piece of paper. Read what it says.)#k

Bring back a #bGrowth Accelerant#k made by #b#p2030012##k and place it behind the brick.
The ingredients are as follows.

10 #t4000070#s
10 #t4000071#s
10 #t4000072#s
10 #t4000068#s

Do not throw away or take this paper. Place it back behind the brick.
#b(You place the paper back behind the brick.)#k
#b(The #p2012034# has been put back into place)#k
#b(Ugh, this mission seems tedious. Since you don't want this mission. put the paper back and pretend you didn't see it.)#k
#b(You remove the #p2012034# and examine the paper again.)#k

Bring back a #bGrowth Accelerant#k made by #b#p2030012##k and place it behind the brick.
The ingredients are as follows.

10 #t4000070#s
10 #t4000071#s
10 #t4000072#s
10 #t4000068#s

Do not throw away or take this paper. Place it back behind the brick.
